change_options: T' change any options (all o' which are optional), press the correspondin' button. When ye be done, press enter.
enter_arg_value: Please enter yer desired value fer the argument "{arg}", then press enter to confirm. Escape to cancel.
enter_file_path: Please enter the path to the file ye wish to convert (includin' file name an', if applicable, extension)
review_settings: These be the settings ye selected. If ye want to proceed, press enter. If not, exit the program (q or ctrl+c)
select_mode_arrows: Select Mode t' use wit' the arrow keys, then press enter t' confirm.
change_options_k: T' change any options (all o' which except the keyframe file are optional), press the correspondin' button. When ye be done, press enter.
